info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.endpoint_handler

Class EndpointHandler<TContext,TRequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.endpoint_handler.EndpointHandler<TContext,TRequest>
  • Type Parameters:
    TContext - type of context associated with endpoint data channel. It is used to avoid unnecessary new instances creation in endpoint.
    TRequest - type of a request received by endpoint

    public abstract class EndpointHandler<TContext,TRequest>
extends Object
    Base class with a common message handling logic from endpoints. It will initiate message contexts, generate service fields etc...

    • Method Detail

      • getEnvironment

        protected abstract info.smart_tools.smartactors.core.iobject.IObject getEnvironment(TContext ctx,
                                                                                    TRequest request)
                                                                             throws Exception
        Parse a message from the given request. Endpoint can receive message in different formats, so we can't make this process common for now.
        Parameters:
        request - request to the endpoint
        ctx - context of the request
        Returns:
        a deserialized message
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is exception at environment getting

      • handle

        public void handle(TContext ctx,
                   TRequest request)
            throws ExecutionException
        Handle an endpoint request using the specified context.
        Parameters:
        ctx - endpoint channel context
        request - request to the endpoint
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - if request failed to handle
